name: Inkheart
description:
Based on the feature film adaptation of the best-selling Cornelia Funke novel, Inkheart is the story of Meggie, a young girl whose father has a secret magical ability; he can bring book characters to life simply by reading the story aloud! It sounds like a wondrous gift, but evil lurks within the pages of a rare children’s fable...

Now, for the first time on your Nintendo DS, embark on a compelling and exciting action adventure. Solve tricky puzzles and challenge difficult tasks. Take on the roles of Meggie, Mo, Dustfinger or Farid and the ink itself will come to life. Immersed in a breathtaking backdrop with lovingly designed details, it is up to you alone to save the world before the dark powers of Capricorn are victorious. Are you ready? Then join Meggie and her friends on their dangerous adventure!

Features

• High-quality, beautiful graphics on your Nintendo DS
• Fantastic world of Inkheart lovingly detailed
• Exciting games and puzzles
